resources.string: This app can\'t work without Phone permission, because it\'s need it to response to incoming calls.
The app can\'t request about the permission, but you can allow it from device settings.
Step 1. Find Multiring app and click it.
Step 2. Turn on \"Allow modify system setting\" switch.
This app need the permission to modify system settings,\nfollow next steps to allow it.
This app can\'t work without Modify system settings permission, because it\'s need it to change the device\'s ringtone.
Ringtone won\'t change when the phone is silent.
Ringtone will change when the phone is silent.
